title: Stocks Down But Steady; Avolon Holdings, SkyWest Rocket
content: at 12:17 PM EDT Stocks pretty much stuck to their early lows approaching midday Friday. The Dow Jones industrials held its 1.6% decline and the S&P 500 retained its 1.4% slip. The Nasdaq narrowed its sharp early loss only slightly, to 1%. Volume slipped 10% on the Nasdaq and 6% on the NYSE, after narrowly mixed trading in early action. The stock market today opened under pressure from a disappointing August payrolls report. The unemployment rate dipped to 5.1%,
